page.title: 14CHALFONT ARTS AND CRAFTS
page.content: The old {tradition} of {lace-making} in Seer Green is being revived at the local school. Jordans has an artist {potter} [ceramicist] who works from home, exporting to America and Japan, also a wall tapestry weaver. Both have lived and worked here for over 25 years. {Professional artists} with studios in the village are a landscape painter, a portrait painter and a commercial freelance artist designer. A 90 year old artist, now blind, is still selling lithographs of his work, including many local sketches. The main crafts in Chalfont St. Peter are lace making, bobbin turning and cane and basket making. There is also an artist who does pen and ink drawings and a bee keeper.
